message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Alice, $22,000 is way out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $8,000.  What do you think?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $22,000 is significantly lower than what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset for you.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $18,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $10,000, which is a fair compromise.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up on your offer. It seems like we both see the value in this product.  To be frank, I have another buyer interested at a higher price point. However, I value your initial interest.  Would you be willing to consider $14,000?

Alice, $14,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm sticking to my offer of $10,000.  If you're not willing to accept that, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.  Let me know what you decide.
